name: Hat TV
description:
Welcome to HatTV!

You are this little awesome duck with an awesome Hat, unfortunately trapped into a not-so-awesome television with only 4 colors.
With this hat you can control the TIME by pausing, slow down or fast forward everything that is wearing an hat... all comfortably through a web player!

One hat to rule them all!

Controls:
- WASD for move and jump.
- Mouse to activate buttons.

---
I really liked the 4 colors limitation (I used this palette), I've learned a lot by using dithering (never used this technique before) and I'm happy with the result!
Unfortunately I've made only 8 levels because I ran out of time.
I hope you like it! :)
